title: Basic Routing & User Management API
description: Build a simple REST API with Gin framework that handles user management operations including creating, reading, updating, and deleting users.
short_description: Learn fundamental Gin routing and build a user management REST API
learning_objectives: Implement HTTP routes (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
real_world_connection: User management APIs are foundational to most web applications, from authentication systems to content management platforms.
requirements: Implement GET /users endpoint to retrieve all users
Implement POST /users endpoint to create new users
Implement GET /users/:id endpoint to get specific user
Implement PUT /users/:id endpoint to update users
Implement DELETE /users/:id endpoint to remove users
